# Textual Representations

> Text is text, nothing more, nothing less.

--

.pull-left[ 
### Markdown 
`This is text`
]
.pull-right[
### Shows As
This is text
]


--

.pull-left[ 
`*Homo sapien*`
]
.pull-right[
*Homo sapien*
]

--

.pull-left[ 
`**Stuff**`
]
.pull-right[
**Stuff**
]


--

.pull-left[ 
`> To be, or not to be...`
]
.pull-right[
> To be, or not to be...
]

# Lists Representations

> Just type them out

--

.pull-left[ 
### Markdown 
<pre>
- Thing
- Other Thing
</pre>
]
.pull-right[
### Shows As
- Thing  
- Other Thing
]


.pull-left[ 
<pre>
1. First thing in ordered list
2. Next thing
</pre>
]
.pull-right[
1. First thing in ordered list  
2. Next thing  
]
